English: to stop / quit (e.g. I started a course)
to close down (e.g. the door opens)
to close (e.g. I open the door)
to speed up (e.g. your walking speed)
to defend (e.g. defend a person / idea)
to gas, put the pedal down, accelerate
to dry out (e.g. I water plants)
to dry up (e.g. I get wet in the rain)
to disappear / vanish (e.g. my keys disappear)
to lose / misplace (e.g. I lose my keys)
to put down (e.g. I lift up a chair)
to hide (e.g. I hide my money)
